reviewText: Akbar- The Great Animated Stories is the Animated stories of The King Akbar. It's very useful to children to understand the history of King Akbar in animated way.

We were pleased to find this in order to supplement a history unit on the Mughal Empire our 3rd grade son was studying. He had learned about Babur, Akbar the Great, and Shah Jahan. This animation helped bring a new dimension to his understanding of the culture, religious tolerance, and ruling empire of the time. Nonetheless, this was a production we chose to borrow from the library / mail order dvd rental rather than purchase b/c it was needed only for a unit of study. This is not a dvd we desire to own.
